CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(
CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "vp"), CONTAINS(Title, "EVP"), CONTAINS(Title, "SVP"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "vicepresident"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "vice president"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "general counsel"), CONTAINS(Title, "AVP")), "VP-level",
IF( OR( (AND( CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "president"),NOT(CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "vice")))),
CONTAINS(Title, "Managing Partner"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "co-director"), CONTAINS(Title, "Chair"), CONTAINS(Title, "President"), CONTAINS(Title, "Principal"), CONTAINS(Title, "Senior Partner"), CONTAINS(Title, "Executive Partner"), CONTAINS(Title, "Founding Partner"), CONTAINS(Title, "Managing Director"), CONTAINS(Title, "Managing Principal"), CONTAINS(Title, "Shareholder"), CONTAINS(Title, "Executive Director")), "Firm Management",
IF( OR( CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "co-founder"), CONTAINS(Title, "Founder"), CONTAINS(Title, "Executive"), CONTAINS(Title, "Officer"), CONTAINS(Title, "Owner"), CONTAINS(Title, "Board"), CONTAINS(Title, "Chief"), CONTAINS(Title, "Head"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "co-head"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "co head"), CONTAINS(Title, "CXO"), CONTAINS(Title, "CFO"), CONTAINS(Title, "COO"), CONTAINS(Title, "CTO"), CONTAINS(Title, "CISO"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "partner"), CONTAINS(Title, "General Counsel"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "officer"), AND(BEGINS((LOWER(Title)), "c"),(LEN(Title)=3))), "CxO",
IF( OR( (AND( CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "director"),NOT(CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "managing")))), (AND( CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "dir"),NOT(CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "managing")))), CONTAINS(Title, "Dir."), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "senior lead")), "Director",
IF( OR( CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "manager"), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "lead"), CONTAINS(Title, "Mgr"), CONTAINS(Title, "Mgr."), CONTAINS((LOWER(Title)), "management")), "Manager",
"Other")
) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Firm Role
